root: ^Hellooo! Just got back from a voyage to
^the far north, and now this pile of
^amber's burning a hole in my boat.
^That’s a metaphor. I don’t know how bright
^you are. Anyway! One of a kind! Hook me up
^I know Asujua’s asking for the same, but
^the solution’s right in front of you--
^copper’s nearly as good as bronze, yeah?

Port9: ^Ha! Well played. You know what, I like your attitude. You’ve got yourself a deal.
